column4: does anyone know why when i try to open limewire.deb and install it it says an error has occurred
i've used limewire before tho on the old ubuntu
frostwire is exactly the same + its not speed limited like limewire basic
it wud have the same amount of ppl sharing the songs too? :o
it uses the same network, gnutella it shares like 90% of code with limewire, but its opensource
which of the 5 ones do i download? :o
there's redhat rpm noarch, ubuntu deb amd64, debian deb i586, tar.gz, ubuntu deb i386
ubuntu deb. are you on a 64 bit version of ubuntu?
thanks very much :D frostwire is working :)
